_header: As Jesu God son almighty / Went ones with his company
_description: Gospel for Second Sunday in Lent, in ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BLHar4196.First Lines: Als ihesu god sun al mightyWent anes with his cumpany…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …ffra wikked life þam forto winvnto þe blis þat neuer sal blin
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Egressus ihesu crist secessit in partes tyri.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Dominica ii quadragesime secundum Matheum (rubric, f. 45rb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.49-53.
